text: Puri: The district administration has asked banks to keep an eye on daily transactions of their customers during the general and Assembly elections. The bankers have been asked to submit details regarding the daily transactions of candidates and other customers to district collector and returning officer Jyotiprakash Das soon after the notification for the third phase elections in state. Das asked the bankers to inform him the details of customers whose...
